name: Cyber Pink
description:
Dont let you pinkibots runaway, if your ballbot moves everything else moves 20 levels, Comic intro Add

To start a level put your curson on BallBot (the red character in the middle of screen) to swing your sword press left clic, BallBots follow the cursor so be careful where you put it, a long move to put the cursor is better than move slow, try to avoid everything on your way or Ballbot will be turn off. Pinkibots move if you move choose those close to leave first.
